Title: Just a Question of Love
Writer: Christian Faure (adaptation), Annick Larboulette (head writer), Pierre Pauquet (adaptation), Pierre Pauquet (screenplay)
Actors: Cyrille Thouvenin, Stéphan Guérin-Tillié, Éva Darlan, Caroline Veyt
Plot: After his gay cousin dies from hepatitis, young Laurent, who lives with his best friend Carole, falls in love with Cedric, a plant scientist. He's afraid to inform his conservative parents that he is gay.
